title: Justice, Sabbaths, and Godâ€™s Promise
summary: Exodus 23 continues the legal code with commands about justice, sabbath rest, and festivals. God promises to send an angel to guide Israel to the Promised Land if they remain faithful.

faq.question: What are the three major festivals Israel was to observe?
faq.answer: The Festival of Unleavened Bread, the Festival of Harvest, and the Festival of Ingathering.

faq.question: What promise does God make at the end of the chapter?
faq.answer: He will send an angel to protect and guide Israel to the Promised Land if they obey Him.
